content: weebee doll hoodie text and images by laura tegg all rights reserved finished products created with this pattern may be used for commercial sale design credit should be given to laura tegg when finished products are listed for sale work up this hoodie to keep your weebee toasty and warm in the winter months simply use the yarn weight and hook that you chose to make your doll & this cosy hoodie will fit perfectly you can find all of my weebee doll and clothing patterns all here http //www ravelry com/designers/laura-tegg now you can also join a new facebook page dedicated to weebee hoping to run a couple of cal s on there in the near future everyone welcome https //www facebook com/groups/1590618731240406/ every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free but i have very little time to spare i have a three year old lol so if you find any errors whatsoever in this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me and i will amend as soon as possible… facebook https //www facebook com/lollys-crafty-crochet-107955012662245/ ravelry http //www ravelry com/people/lollyscc terminology us other items needed stitch marker tapestry needle stuffing abbreviations chain chain space space half_double_crochet half_double_crochet skip skp half_double_crochet decrease hdc2tog stitch st loop lp slip_stitch slip_stitch next nxt yarn over yo single_crochet single_crochet pattern start jacket ch25 row 1 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook and into each st across turn 24 row 2 ch1 not a st from now on single_crochet in next 4 sts front 3sc in next st single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts shoulder 3sc in next st single_crochet in each of the next 8 sts back 3sc in next st single_crochet in each of the next 2 sts shoulder 3sc in next st single_crochet in each of the remaining 4 sts front turn 32sts row 3 ch1 half_double_crochet in next 5 sts front 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts shoulder 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in each of the next 10 sts back 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts shoulder 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in each of the remaining 5 sts front turn 40sts row 4 ch1 half_double_crochet in next 6 sts front 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in each of the next 6 sts shoulder 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in each of the next 12 sts back 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in each of the next 6 sts shoulder 3hdc in next st half_double_crochet in each of the remaining 6 sts front turn 48sts row 5 ch1 single_crochet in next 8 sts ch5 arm hole made skp 8 sts single_crochet in each of the next 16 sts ch5 arm hole made skp 8 sts single_crochet in each of the remaining 8 sts turn 32sts & 2 ch5 sps row 6 ch1 half_double_crochet in next 8 sts 6hdc in ch5 space half_double_crochet in each of the next 16 sts
